official_title: Honoring Apostle Frederick K.C. Price on his 80th birthday.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Honors Apostle Frederick K.C. Price, who is known for the Crenshaw Christian Center and the Ever Increasing Faith Ministries, on his 80th birthday and for his philanthropy, service, and social justice efforts worldwide.

titles.title: Honoring Apostle Frederick K.C. Price on his 80th birthday.
